channel.title: CVE Feed for Dahua -- NVR4XXX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dahua -- NVR4XXX

item.title: CVE-2024-39947|2024-07-31T03:25:09.750Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.After obtaining the ordinary user's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.

item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.After obtaining the administrator's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing device initialization.
